profile.title: Profile
profile.summary: Experienced Front End Developer with expertise in design, building, testing and maintenance of modern sites. Proficient in various languages, SCSS, JavaScript, jQuery, React and embedded systems. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate as part of a productive team.

skillOne.title: Libraries & Frameworks
skillOne.list: React, Vue.js, Next.js, jQuery, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap

jobs.title: Front-End Web Developer
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver responsive, accessible, and visually appealing web experiences tailored to client needs, adhering to modern design and coding standards.
Developed and maintained scalable, performant front-end components using SCSS, JavaScript, and CMS-driven architectures, ensuring seamless integration with back-end systems.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for the latest two versions of all major browsers, prioritizing user experience and accessibility compliance (ADA/WCAG standards).
Employed tools like Gulp to streamline workflows, implement vendor prefixes, and enforce consistency across CSS stylesheets.
Conducted detailed code reviews and collaborated with team leads to refine processes and uphold best practices in front-end development.

jobs.title: Web Development Engineer
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify potential issues in a site before sending it to a client to help increase overall client satisfaction.
Helped identify the common visual and functional patterns used throughout site builds and break down these patterns into smaller, reusable components to reduce frontend development time.
Analyzed legacy site code and architecture to identify potential causes of issues and updated accordingly using current ADA guidelines and HTML best practices to boost client confidence.
Identified bottlenecks and pain points in the site build process, such as manual tasks or inefficient workflows with cross-functional teams.

Defined and documented coding standards and best practices for the team. Used a consistent code style throughout projects, including naming conventions, formatting, and indentation, which helped ease reading for cross-functional teams and a reduction in errors.

jobs.title: Web Designer & Front-End Developer
description: Used design systems and style guides to establish a consistent design language and reduce the need for custom design work.
Used rapid prototyping tools, like Figma and Sketch, to quickly iterate on design ideas and get feedback from stakeholders and users.
Created multiple design concepts or wireframes to present to the client, each with a unique approach to the design problem to ensure the client was happy with the outcome.
Introduced ADA standards to ensure new sites have a clear and easy-to-use navigation structure, with all menus and links accessible using a keyboard.

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.company: First Call Group Ltd., Weston-super-Mare, England
description: Conducted a thorough audit of companies existing site's HTML code to identify outdated or non-standard coding practices, to help determine which new HTML standards to use for the rebuild, resulting in faster and more stable sites.
Ensured that the company sites were responsive and optimized for all devices and screen sizes, including mobile devices to help with UX.
Used a modular, component-based approach to design and development, allowing for more efficient reuse of code and design elements.
